descriptions.paragraph: Hello! My name is Rauf and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My interest in web development started back in 2017 when I decided to try built portfolio site — turns out hacking together a custom reblog button taught me a lot about HTML & CSS and React itself!

Fast-forward to today, and I’ve had the privilege of working at an software house company, a start-up, a huge corporation. My main focus these days is building accessible, inclusive products and digital experiences at Sicepat for a variety of clients
